name: Survival Escape: Crime case Criminal mystery
name_original: Survival Escape: Crime case Criminal mystery
description:
Criminal Theme Hidden Object Is Always a Top Casual Game for the Hidden Object lovers to play.Enjoy The Latest Game on the store by salon Games For Girls as the Criminal Escape HiddenObject ,Find Clues be a detective act like you are the world saver from the world war III . The job of Detective is to find a clue and based on the clue investigate the criminal or a murderer.

The Clues are used to identify the criminal in the investigation of a crime,try to find the many clues for the investigation and make your case strong make your squad of a officer and let them find the weapon used in the murder and solve the mystery of the city murder.be a leader and save your city from the terrorist.

Feature

* Find investigaion object of a crime.
* Detactive of a murder mystery.
* Hidden Object of more then 100 HD Objects
* More then 10 Levels to enjoy
* Make your detactive team to lead to save the world war III.
*Find the weapon used in the crime or a murder.
